functions.argsstring_html: (const char *name, const TType fieldType, const int16_t fieldId, int8_t typeOverride)

definition.original_argsstring_html: (const char *name, const TType fieldType, const int16_t fieldId, int8_t typeOverride)

description.detailed_html: The workhorse of writeFieldBegin. It has the option of doing a 'type override' of the type header. This is used specifically in the boolean field case.

brief_html: The workhorse of writeFieldBegin. It has the option of doing a 'type override' of the type header. This is used specifically in the boolean field case.
